title: Last stands: Tasmania
creator_credit: Island Films, Phil Lohrey and David Woodhall
brief_description: The last stands of temperate rainforests in Tasmania. Examines the issues of the geology of the forest, the problems posed by hydroelectric schemes and logging operations.
creator_credit_for_label: Island Films, Phil Lohrey and David Woodhall
